name: Glassy Carbon Working Electrode
introduction: The Glassy Carbon Working Electrode is designed for high-precision electrochemical measurements. Made from high-purity glassy carbon, these electrodes offer excellent electrical conductivity, chemical resistance, and mechanical stability. Available in two diameter options, 3 mm ID and 5 mm ID, these electrodes are ideal for a variety of electrochemical applications, including voltammetry, amperometry, and electrochemical analysis.
applications: Voltammetry - Ideal for cyclic voltammetry, linear sweep voltammetry, and other voltammetric techniques.
Amperometry - Suitable for amperometric measurements in various analytical applications.
Electrochemical Analysis - Used in the analysis of electrochemical properties of materials, including sensors and catalysts.
Research and Development - Essential for developing new electrochemical methods and materials in academic and industrial research.
Quality Control: Applied in routine quality control and testing in electrochemical laboratories.
Packaging: Individually packaged, customizable quantities available upon request
Customization: Custom sizes and configurations are available upon request. Please contact our sales team for more information.

name: Glassy L Shape Working Electrode
introduction: The Glassy Carbon L-Shaped Working Electrode is specifically designed to offer exceptional performance in a compact, easy-to-use form factor. Known for its superior chemical resistance, low background currents, and broad potential windows, this electrode is ideal for a wide range of electrochemical applications, from research laboratories to industrial settings.
applications: Electrochemical Analysis - Ideal for cyclic voltammetry, linear sweep voltammetry, and differential pulse voltammetry.
Sensors - Perfect for integration into biosensors and chemical sensors.
Energy Storage Research - Utilized in the development and testing of batteries, supercapacitors, and fuel cells.
Environmental Monitoring - Effective for detecting pollutants and monitoring water quality.
Research and Development - Essential for studying electrochemical behaviors and developing new materials in both academic and industrial research.
ElectrodeLength: Standard lengths for the vertical and horizontal sections, customizable upon request
ConnectorType: Standard banana plug, BNC, or custom connectors available
Customization: Custom sizes and configurations are available upon request. Please contact our sales team for more information.
